Description: Updated 3 bed, 1 bath located in Winter Hill. This lovely second floor apartment boasts an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances & gas range. Other features include hardwood floors, nice natural light, laundry in-unit, porch, and bike storage in the basement. Only a few blocks to the Green Line and conveniently located to both Magoun & Ball Squares, Assembly Row and I-93. Parking is resident street permit. Come experience all Somerville has to offer!
